argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | isms.j | |- J = ( TopOpen ` K ) |
| 2 |  | isms.x | |- X = ( Base ` K ) |
| 3 |  | isms.d | |- D = ( ( dist ` K ) |` ( X X. X ) ) |
| 4 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_isxms2 | |- ( K e. *MetSp <-> ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) /\ J = ( MetOpen ` D ) ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_anbi1i | |- ( ( K e. *MetSp /\ D e. ( Met ` X ) ) <-> ( ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) /\ J = ( MetOpen ` D ) ) /\ D e. ( Met ` X ) ) ) |
| 6 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_isms | |- ( K e. MetSp <-> ( K e. *MetSp /\ D e. ( Met ` X ) ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_metxmet | |- ( D e. ( Met ` X ) -> D e. ( *Met ` X ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_pm4.71ri | |- ( D e. ( Met ` X ) <-> ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) /\ D e. ( Met ` X ) ) ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_anbi1i | |- ( ( D e. ( Met ` X ) /\ J = ( MetOpen ` D ) ) <-> ( ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) /\ D e. ( Met ` X ) ) /\ J = ( MetOpen ` D ) ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_an32 | |- ( ( ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) /\ D e. ( Met ` X ) ) /\ J = ( MetOpen ` D ) ) <-> ( ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) /\ J = ( MetOpen ` D ) ) /\ D e. ( Met ` X ) ) ) |
| 11 | 9, 10 | #P_bitri | |- ( ( D e. ( Met ` X ) /\ J = ( MetOpen ` D ) ) <-> ( ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) /\ J = ( MetOpen ` D ) ) /\ D e. ( Met ` X ) ) ) |
| 12 | 5, 6, 11 | #P_3bitr4i | |- ( K e. MetSp <-> ( D e. ( Met ` X ) /\ J = ( MetOpen ` D ) ) ) |
